cause.description:

For more information on Mr. Heller's part — the Orange Pants Party — please visit the following webiste:
http://www.youtube.com/profile?user=channel187

2. Upon his election, Mr. Heller shall work towards separating the U.S. into the United States of Keeping It Real and the Christian theocracy known as RoveCheneystan.
